mapper.select: select * from message where recver=#{recver} and status!= 2 order by status,sendtime desc
select orderid from message where recver=#{recver} and status!= 1
select * from message where recver=#{recver} and status = 1 order by sendtime desc
select * from message where recver=#{recver} and status = 0 order by sendtime desc
mapper.update: update message set `status` = 1 where recver = #{recver,jdbcType=INTEGER} and orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
update message set `status` = 0 where recver = #{recver,jdbcType=INTEGER} and orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
